Package battle

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IGame
    This interface declare certain methods
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoPlayer
    This class allows you to create a auto player
    BattleShip
    The battleShip class reads the configuration file and initializes the game parameters.
    Game
    This class allows you to create and initialize a Game
    HumanPlayer
    This class allows you to create a human player
    Player
    This class allows you to create a Player with his grid and his fleet.
    Ship
    The Ship class allows you to create a boat with all the necessary information.
    Square
    A class that allows you to create a Square
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Direction
    This enumeration creates the variables concerning the orientation of the boat.
    Mode
    This enumeration creates the variables to identify the types of players.
    ShotResult
    This enumeration creates the variables concerning the shot result.
